summary: With the ratings dropping for a wilderness-themed television show, two animal fans go to the Andes Mountains in search of Bigfoot.
cast: Steve Zahn|Allen Covert|Jonah Hill|Kevin Heffernan|Ashley Scott|Peter Dante|Harry Hamlin|Robert Patrick|Joe Don Baker|Blake Clark|Justin Long|Jeff Garlin|Ernest Borgnine|Jake Abel|Kevin Alejandro|Rick Batalla|Terrence Beasor|Richard Cassese|Steven Arthur Chaves|Judith Drake|John Farley|Ayda Field|Oliver Hudson|Geno Kirkland|Sheila Lussier|Rene Marentes|David Mattey|Jim Meskimen|Mitsuyuki Oishi|Michelle Paniz|Jennifer Perkins|Alveraz Ricardez|Emilio Rivera|Bryan Ross|Roberto 'Sanz' Sanchez|Jason Sandler|Angela Shelton|Mario Soto|Meg Wolf|Molly Wolf|Shawn Woodward|Sheryl Chambers|Brooke Lenzi|Leah McCormick|Jason Williams
title: Naturaleza a lo bestia
